levels.description: Gradually generates <@ba.vup>{value}</> DP over the skill duration, and causes attacks to hit <@ba.vup>3 times</>; When Vigil or the Wolfpack deal damage to a unit blocked by the Wolfpack, they deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@vigil_s_3.atk_scale:0%}</> of Vigil's ATK as Arts damage
